description: UADM - Ubuntu administration scripts. A set of script that allows to automate task and notify the administrator by mail when thing went wrong. Update os, backup directories on a remote samba server, auto reinstall vmware tools on new kernel.
longdescription: UADM - Ubuntu administration scripts. A set of script that allows to automate task and notify the administrator by mail when thing went wrong. Update os, backup directories on a remote samba server, auto reinstall vmware tools on new kernel.
